properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 1:28PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
A series of heavy snow showers will be parading southeast across
South pass through around 3 PM.

* WHAT...Heavy snowfall with local snow amounts of 1 to 3 inches.
Brief periods of visibility dropping well below one quarter of
a mile.

* WHERE...The Fremont County side of South Pass including the
vicinity of South Pass City and Atlantic City, as well as the
Louis Lake turn off.

* WHEN...Through 3 PM this afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...|Anticipate rapidly changing road
conditions, including slick and snow covered roads, as well as
poor visibility.

NWSheadline: Heavy snow showers over South Pass
